distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for tomcat fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-24122: Fixed an information disclosure if resources are served from the NTFS file system (bsc#1180947).
notes.title: Description of the patch

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 15 SP2

notes.text: When serving resources from a network location using the NTFS file system, Apache Tomcat versions 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.0-M9, 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.39, 8.5.0 to 8.5.59 and 7.0.0 to 7.0.106 were susceptible to JSP source code disclosure in some configurations. The root cause was the unexpected behaviour of the JRE API File.getCanonicalPath() which in turn was caused by the inconsistent behaviour of the Windows API (FindFirstFileW) in some circumstances.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
